verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֣נָה <WH575> How יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Jehovah תִּשְׁכָּחֵ֣נִי <WH7911> How long wilt thou forget נֶ֑צַח <WH5331> alway עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֓נָה ׀ <WH575> How תַּסְתִּ֖יר <WH5641> hide אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> thy face מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֨נָה <WH575> How אָשִׁ֪ית <WH7896> How long shall I take עֵצ֡וֹת <WH6098> counsel בְּנַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> in my soul יָג֣וֹן <WH3015> [having] sorrow בִּלְבָבִ֣י <WH3824> in my heart יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> daily עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֓נָה ׀ <WH575> How יָר֖וּם <WH7311> be exalted אֹיְבִ֣י <WH341> enemy עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> over

הַבִּ֣יטָֽה <WH5027> Consider עֲ֭נֵנִי <WH6030> [and] hear יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> my God הָאִ֥ירָה <WH215> lighten עֵ֝ינַ֗י <WH5869> mine eyes פֶּן־ <WH6435> or אִישַׁ֥ן <WH3462> lest I sleep הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> the [sleep of] death

פֶּן־ <WH6435> lest יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> say אֹיְבִ֣י <WH341> Lest mine enemy יְכָלְתִּ֑יו <WH3201> I have prevailed צָרַ֥י <WH6862> against him [and] those that trouble יָ֝גִ֗ילוּ <WH1523> me rejoice כִּ֣י <WH3588> when אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> when I am moved
וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> in בְּחַסְדְּךָ֣ <WH2617> in thy mercy בָטַחְתִּי֮ <WH982> But I have trusted יָ֤גֵ֥ל <WH1523> shall rejoice לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> my heart בִּֽישׁוּעָ֫תֶ֥ךָ <WH3444> in thy salvation
אָשִׁ֥ירָה <WH7891> I will sing לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּ֖י <WH3588> Because גָמַ֣ל <WH1580> because he hath dealt bountifully עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> the chief
